# Know More About Me

I’m currently a first-year student in MS biostatistics program on theory and method track. I’m taking a few data-analysis related courses such as data science and biostatistical methods. By taking these courses, I’ve learned data entry and data management using R. In addition to schoolwork, I work at ICAP at Columbia university as a program assistant. I mainly provide administrative support for ICAP systems and assist with data cleaning, entry, and document migration.
